mapper.sql: STU_UUID, SUB_NO, STU_ID, STU_NAME, STU_BIRTHDAY, STU_GENDER, STU_PWD, STU_IDENTITY, STU_PHONE, CREATE_DATE, STU_CUR_SUB, DRIVING_TYPE, FORMER_TYPE, ETHNIC_GROUP, CUR_LOCATION, IDENTITY_LOCATION
mapper.insert: insert into STUDENT (STU_UUID, SUB_NO, STU_ID, STU_NAME, STU_BIRTHDAY, STU_GENDER, STU_PWD, STU_IDENTITY, STU_PHONE, CREATE_DATE, STU_CUR_SUB, DRIVING_TYPE, FORMER_TYPE, ETHNIC_GROUP, CUR_LOCATION, IDENTITY_LOCATION) values (#{stuUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEQUENCESTU.NEXTVAL, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stuGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stuCurSub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ethnicGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update STUDENT
SUB_NO = #{subNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_BIRTHDAY = #{stuBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STU_GENDER = #{stuGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_PWD = #{stuPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_IDENTITY = #{stuIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_PHONE = #{stuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STU_CUR_SUB = #{stuCurSub,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVING_TYPE = #{drivingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORMER_TYPE = #{formerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETHNIC_GROUP = #{ethnicGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUR_LOCATION = #{curLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY_LOCATION = #{identityLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update STUDENT set SUB_NO = #{subNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_BIRTHDAY = #{stuBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STU_GENDER = #{stuGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_PWD = #{stuPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_IDENTITY = #{stuIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_PHONE = #{stuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STU_CUR_SUB = #{stuCurSub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVING_TYPE = #{drivingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORMER_TYPE = #{formerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETHNIC_GROUP = #{ethnicGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUR_LOCATION = #{curLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY_LOCATION = #{identityLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where STU_UUID = #{stuUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STUDENT WHERE STU_ID = #{stuId} AND STU_PWD=#{stuPwd}
SELECT * FROM STUDENT WHERE STU_UUID = #{stuUuid} AND STU_PWD = #{oldPwd}
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET STU_PWD = #{newPwd} WHERE STU_UUID = #{stuUuid}
mapper.select: SELECT STU_UUID FROM STUDENT WHERE STU_ID = (SELECT MAX(STU_ID) FROM STUDENT)
mapper.insert: insert into STUDENT (STU_UUID, SUB_NO, STU_ID, STU_NAME, STU_BIRTHDAY, STU_GENDER, STU_PWD, STU_IDENTITY, STU_PHONE, CREATE_DATE, STU_CUR_SUB, DRIVING_TYPE, FORMER_TYPE, ETHNIC_GROUP, CUR_LOCATION, IDENTITY_LOCATION) values (#{stuUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEQ_STU_ID.NEXTVAL, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stuGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stuCurSub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ethnicGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
